title: hidden-xs
description: Node Js/Express JS baseb web application, powered by MapBox API, DarkSky API and FormCarry.

description: For all you Jekyll Developers and Lovers out there. This is a simple boiler plate project that you can use to start building static front-end sites with.

title: Meow Meow JS | Sniffer Project
description: This is a client side javascript project that hosts a bunch of feature sniffing methods. Useful in case you'd want to avoid unnecessary checks and writing code.

description: Inspired by a Codepen Project, a jumbotron section which has a rotating heading text. Displays video on backgroun on desktop.

title: Click-To-Play Youtube Video
description: Client side javascript project that helps in playing youtube videos on your web application.
